icon.desc: Icon to be used on the left side or as the button text.

icon-right.desc: Icon to be used on the right side.

loading.desc: Set the button to loading state with a loading spinner.

percentage.desc: Optional property to be used along with loading, to determinate the progress.

dark-percentage.desc: Optional property to display the percentage on a light button color.

label.desc: The text that will be shown on the button.

repeat-timeout.desc: Enables multiple @click events on click or tap and hold. The funcion will receive an Number argument 'timesTriggered'.

wait-for-ripple.desc: Wait for the ripple effect to finish before emitting the @click event.

type.desc: Define the button HTML DOM type.

to.desc: Vue-Router direction for the button to call when clicked.

replace.desc: Replace the current route, not pushing it to the window history.

size.desc: Button size as one of the examples or a css unit string size.

glossy.desc: Apply the glossy effect over the button.

fab.desc: Makes the button as a Floating Action Button

no-caps.desc: Define as true if you dont want the material design uppercase letter.

no-ripple.desc: Disable the material design ripple effect.

click.desc: Emitted on QBtn click if 'disabled' property is not defined as 'true'
